scripts.start: cross-env HOST=localhost PORT=3000 ORIGIN=http://localhost:3000 tsx server.ts
scripts.loc: git ls-files | grep -Ev '^src/lib/components/ui/(avatar|button|button-group|card-|collapsible|context-menu|dialog|dropdown-menu|empty|input|label|pagination|popover|progress|resizable|separator|sheet|sidebar|skeleton|sonner|spinner|tabs|tooltip)/' | grep -Ev "package-lock\.json|\.png$|\.jpg$|\.jpeg$|\.gif$|\.svg$|\.ico$|\.webp$|\.pdf$|\.ttf$|\.woff2?$|\.mp4$|\.mov$|\.exe$|\.bin$" | xargs wc -l
scripts.loc-w: git ls-files | Where-Object { $_ -notmatch '^src/lib/components/ui/(avatar|button|button-group|card-|collapsible|context-menu|dialog|dropdown-menu|empty|input|label|pagination|popover|progress|resizable|separator|sheet|sidebar|skeleton|sonner|spinner|tabs|tooltip)/' } | Where-Object { $_ -notmatch 'package-lock\.json$|\.png$|\.jpg$|\.jpeg$|\.gif$|\.svg$|\.ico$|\.webp$|\.pdf$|\.ttf$|\.woff2?$|\.mp4$|\.mov$|\.exe$|\.bin$' } | ForEach-Object { (Get-Content $_ | Measure-Object -Line).Lines } | Measure-Object -Sum
